title: location
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: Big Oaks National Wildlife Refuge, Madison, IN, USA

title: plot
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: experimental plot, which corresponds to planting treatment (1 - 10)

title: sp
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: species (Ev = Elymus virginicus, Mv = Microstegium vimineum)

title: ID
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: plant ID (A = focal adult, 1 - 3 = focal seedlings)

title: leaves_tot
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: number of leaves on a tiller

title: leaves_infec
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: number of leaves with at least two lesions on that same tiller

title: Bp_spots
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: indicator variable of whether or not individuals appeared to have Bipolaris infection (leopard-like spots)

title: scan
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: indicator variable of whether or not a leaf was collected for scanning

title: microbiome
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: number of leaves that were taken from the whole plot for microbiome analysis

title: seeds_collected
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: indicator variable of whether or not seeds were collected from Ev

title: flower_bags
focal_disease_sep_2019_density_exp: number of mesh bags placed on Mv flowers (up to 5)
